text:
## Account Troubleshooting

### Password reset

You can reset your password if you forgot it, or simply want to change it. To do so, navigate to the WCS login page and click Forgot Password.

### Where is my verification email?

If you did not receive a verification email, please check your spam folder. If you still cannot find it, you can try again using the same steps as the password reset.

## General

If you encounter problems with WCS, or have questions, please contact us below:

- Forum
- Email
- Slack
name: wcs-troubleshooting
